If you're looking for a stylish and captivating mafia film, then "Sin City" (2005) starring Nicky Katt and Jessica Alba is a great choice. It explores the complexities of a successful couple facing challenges due to Philip's frequent trips.

If you're drawn to a gritty crime drama with complex characters, then "The Departed" (2006) starring Matt Damon and Leonardo DiCaprio is a perfect fit. It revolves around an undercover cop and a mole in the police trying to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang.

If you're seeking a thought-provoking and suspenseful film about an assassin seeking revenge for a past mistake, then "Downfall" (2004) starring Juliane Köhler is highly recommended. It explores the allure and consequences of drug-fueled pasts and the quest for redemption.
